headline: Will Fiserv’s (FI) State-Backed Stablecoin Initiative Reinforce Its Digital Asset Leadership?
summary: Fiserv, in partnership with the Bank of North Dakota, recently announced the launch of Roughrider coin, the state’s first stablecoin fully backed by US dollars and set to be available to local banks and credit unions in 2026 using the Fiserv digital asset platform. This initiative marks the first US state-backed stablecoin deployment on a major digital asset payments infrastructure and highlights Fiserv's growing role in regulated digital asset solutions for the banking sector. We'll explore...

headline: A Fresh Look at Fiserv’s Valuation Following Launch of First State Stablecoin, Roughrider Coin
summary: Fiserv (NYSE:FI) has made headlines with the announcement of Roughrider coin, a fully USD-backed stablecoin created in partnership with the Bank of North Dakota. This launch introduces the nation’s first state stablecoin and signals a new chapter in digital payments infrastructure. See our latest analysis for Fiserv. Fiserv’s announcement of the Roughrider coin adds new momentum to its digital payments ambitions, even as the market mood has turned cautious. The company’s share price has...
